statements: SELECT * FROM sensitive_loan_data;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount FROM sensitive_loan_data WHERE loan_id = 1001;
SELECT loan_id, borrower_name, loan_amount FROM sensitive_loan_data WHERE loan_approval_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM sensitive_loan_data WHERE loan_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT loan_id, borrower_name, loan_approval_date FROM sensitive_loan_data WHERE borrower_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM sensitive_loan_data WHERE loan_id = 100
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount FROM sensitive_loan_data WHERE loan_amount > 5000 ORDER BY loan_amount DESC
SELECT loan_id, borrower_name, loan_approval_date FROM sensitive_loan_data WHERE loan_approval_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM sensitive_loan_data WHERE borrower_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS loan_count, SUM(loan_amount) AS total_loan_amount FROM sensitive_loan_data
SELECT * FROM loans;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount FROM loans ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT loan_id, borrower_name, loan_amount FROM loans WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE borrower_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT loan_id, borrower_name, loan_amount FROM loans WHERE loan_amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE loan_amount > 10000 ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT loan_id, borrower_name, loan_amount FROM loans WHERE borrower_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY borrower_name ASC;
SELECT borrower_name, encrypted_ssn FROM loans WHERE loan_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY borrower_name DESC, encrypted_ssn ASC;
SELECT * FROM loan_officers WHERE department = 'Finance' AND access_level > 2 ORDER BY officer_name ASC;
SELECT officer_name, department FROM loan_officers WHERE access_level = 1 ORDER BY department ASC, officer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, loan_amount FROM loans WHERE loan_type = 'Personal';
SELECT * FROM loans ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT id, customer_name, loan_type FROM loans WHERE loan_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, encrypted_data FROM loans WHERE loan_type = 'Auto' AND loan_amount < 5000;
SELECT * FROM loans ORDER BY loan_amount DESC, customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, loan_amount FROM loans WHERE loan_amount > 10000;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_loans, loan_type FROM loans GROUP BY loan_type HAVING num_loans > 2;
SELECT users.username, access_control.access_level FROM users INNER JOIN access_control ON users.user_id = access_control.user_id WHERE users.role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE encrypted_data IS NOT NULL AND loan_type = 'car_loan';
SELECT * FROM LoanApplications;
SELECT applicant_name, loan_amount FROM LoanApplications WHERE status='approved';
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, status FROM LoanApplications ORDER BY applicant_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM LoanApprovals WHERE approval_status='pending';
SELECT security_id, encryption_key FROM LoanSecurity;
SELECT * FROM LoanApplications;
SELECT applicant_name, loan_amount FROM LoanApplications WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM LoanOfficers ORDER BY department DESC, officer_name ASC;
SELECT application_id, approval_date, approval_status FROM LoanApprovals WHERE approval_status = 'approved';
SELECT officer_name, department, email FROM LoanOfficers WHERE department = 'Finance' OR department = 'HR';
SELECT * FROM LoanApplications;
SELECT applicant_name, loan_amount FROM LoanApplications WHERE loan_status='approved';
SELECT customer_name, email_address, phone_number FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT officer_name, department FROM LoanOfficers WHERE access_level='manager' ORDER BY officer_name ASC;
SELECT decision_date, decision_result FROM LoanDecisions WHERE decision_id=3;
SELECT * FROM LoanApplications;
SELECT applicant_name, loan_amount FROM LoanApplications WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT officer_name, department FROM LoanOfficers WHERE access_level = 'Manager';
SELECT customer_name, email_address, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT application_id, decision_date, decision_result FROM LoanDecisions ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
